Package command

Class Summary
Command Command is the abstract class the Command classes must adhere to.
CommandController CommandController will create a HashMap containing references to the command classes and use resolveCommand to look up the relevant command class based on the command received.
GotTripCommand This class is used when another Peer is telling us that we got the trip.
HandleTripCommand This class handles trips.
HelloCommand This command is used when another Peer announces itself.
MissTripCommand If another company got the trip first this command will be received to tell the Peer that it didn't get the trip.
PeersCommand This command is used after the Peer has announced itself to the network, all other Peers will respond with this command to share their peer list.
ReqTaxiCommand This command is received when another peer requests the coordinates of your taxis.
SendTaxiCommand Another peer has send the taxis that this peer requested.
TaxiAcceptCommand A taxi of a company have accepted the trip that this peer is responsible for.
TaxiOfferCommand A taxi has been offered a trip.
UnknownCommand UnknownCommand is invoked when an unknown command is received from the Card Reader.
